data.client_settings: N/A (cross-platform). Personally tested on Discord Alpha 7.4.0 (Android client)
data.actual_result: ALL embeds will break, even those that aren't explicit
data.expected_result: Only the embed detected as explicit shouldn't show up
data.short_description: [Cross platform bug] If you post several links in the same message, if only ONE link has an embed detected as explicit, then ALL embeds will break
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a channel where you have Embed Links permissions, and where explicit content filter is enabled  - In the same message, post several links that produce an embed each, with ONE link that's gonna be detected as explicit - Send the message in chat
